pr_title: PARQUET-1938: Key rotation - option to get KMS details from key material

timeline.message: Key rotation - option to get KMS details from key material

timeline.bodyText: It is not common to set a value in the hadoop conf in our code base. I would expect some comments about why this is necessary. Also, I am not sure if this would not impact the caller. If the caller gives us a hadoop Configuration object we should not modify it.
timeline.author: gszadovszky
